mapper.select: select gd.goodsDetail_no,g.name,addPay from parts_ChangeList pc inner join ( select * from parts_change where partsChange_no = #{partsChange_no} ) s1 on pc.partsChange_no = s1.partschange_no inner join goods_Detail gd on pc.goodsDetail_no = gd.goodsDetail_no inner join goods g on g.goods_no = gd.goods_no
